code: import{React,useEffect,useRef}from'react';import Aos from'aos';import"aos/dist/aos.css";import'./Projects.css';import{gsap}from"gsap";import{ScrollTrigger}from"gsap/dist/ScrollTrigger";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger);function Projects(){useEffect(function(){Aos.init({duration:2000});},[]);var headlineRef=useRef();var sectionRef=useRef();useEffect(function(){gsap.fromTo(headlineRef.current,{autoAlpha:0,y:-20},{y:0,autoAlpha:1,duration:1,ease:"power3.out",scrollTrigger:{scroller:".container",trigger:headlineRef.current,start:"top 60%",end:"bottom 0%",toggleActions:"play none restart reverse"}});return function(){};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Projects-Container",ref:sectionRef,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Project-Overview",ref:headlineRef,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Projects-Title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Projects (Updates in progress!)"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Project",id:"Project-One"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Project",id:"Project-Two"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Project",id:"Project-Three"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Project",id:"Project-Four"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Project",id:"Project-Five"})]})});}export default Projects;
